songs.title: We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together (Cover)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Normani & All]
I remember when we broke up
You're saying, "This is it, I've had enough"
We hadn't seen each other in a month
When you said you
Needed space

[Verse 1: Lauren & Camila & Normani & Dinah & {Ally}]:
Then you come around again and say
"Baby, I miss you and I swear I'm gonna change"
Remember how that lasted for a day?
I say "I hate you", we break up
You call me, {"I love you"}

[Pre-Chorus: Camila & Dinah & Normani]
Ooh, we called it off again last night, but
Ooh, this time I'm telling you, I'm telling you

[Chorus: Camila & All]
We
Are never ever ever
Getting back together
We
Are never ever ever
Getting back together
You go talk to your friends, talk to my friends, talk to me
But we
Are never ever ever
Getting back together

[Verse 2: Ally & Normani & Camila]
I'm really gonna miss you picking fights
Falling for it screaming that I'm right
And you
Would hide away and find your piece of mind
With some indie record that's much cooler than mine

[Pre-Chorus: Camila & Dinah & Normani]
Ooh, we called it off again last night, but
Ooh, this time I'm telling you, I'm telling you

[Chorus: Lauren & All]
We
Are never ever ever
Getting back together
We
Are never ever ever
Getting back together
You go talk to your friends, talk to my friends, talk to me
But we
Are never ever ever
Getting back together
